org.jplot2d.tex

Class MathLabelComp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jplot2d.tex.MathLabelComp

  • public abstract class MathLabelComp
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent a component of MathLabel. It may be a simple string or composite of other components. The laying out operate at device (screen) coordinate system.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MathLabelComp

        protected MathLabelComp(MathElement me,
             java.awt.Font font,
             double x,
             double y)
        Create underlayer components, width and height are calculated. Subclass should create its sub-component recursively.
        Parameters:
        me - the MathElement object. can be null if the parsed text is empty string.
        font - the font
        x - the x of relative location
        y - the y of relative location

    • Method Detail

      • getBoxInstance

        protected static MathLabelComp getBoxInstance(MathElement me,
                           double x,
                           double y,
                           java.awt.Font font,
                           boolean wstyle)
        Static factory method. Create a proper subclass according to the given MathElement argument.
        Parameters:
        me - the math element
        x - the x of relative location
        y - the y of relative location
        font - the font
        wstyle - with math style

      • relayout

        protected void relayout(float fontSize,
            double x,
            double y)
        re-layout sub elements, after font changed. The height and width are re-calculated.

      • pan

        protected void pan(double xoff,
       double yoff)
        Pan the location of this component an offset.
        Parameters:
        xoff - the x offset
        yoff - the y offset
